channel.title: Lambda Out Loud
channel.description: Recent content on Lambda Out Loud

item.title: Stash Pull Pop
item.description: Fetch upstream changes easily, even if you have unstaged changes.

item.title: Functional creative coding
item.description: Exploring creative coding options in functional languages.

item.title: About
item.description: Lambda Out Loud is a blog about all things code. You’ll see posts here ranging from tutorials to just some interesting things I came across. If you spot any typos, have any suggestions, or if you want to improve a post, feel free to open an issue or pull request.

item.title: Accessing private properties in PHP
item.description: Private properties can only be accessed by the class that defines the property… right? Actually, PHP has a few ways to circumvent this: reflection, closures and array casting.

item.title: Classes in Lisp: an introduction to CLOS
item.description: If you’re coming from the more mainstream OO languages, the Common Lisp Object System (CLOS) might seem a bit alien. This introduction is intended to get you up to speed with the basic principles of object orientation in Lisp.
